title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 302-2.6 - Candor and fairness
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 302-2.6 - Candor and fairness

State Regulations
A representative should: (a) state all facts correctly, whether in
writing or orally; (b) perform
punctually his written or oral commitments; and
(c) communicate with an adverse party who is
represented by an attorney or licensed representative only through such
attorney or representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
302-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
